[[File:David T. Wenzel - Raft-elves.jpg: The '''raft-elves''' brought goods on the [[Forest River]] between the [[Woodland Realm]] and [[Lake-town
thumb: Esgaroth]]. The goods were stored in barrels which were tied together and then poled or rowed up the river. Sometimes they also used flat boats, on which the goods were loaded.<ref name=H9>{{H

[[File:David T. Wenzel - Raft-elves.jpg: The term "raft-elves" is mentioned only once,<ref name=H9/> so likely these elves pertained to [[Thranduil]]'s [[Elves of Mirkwood
: The Raft-elves are a separate tribe of Nando and Sindar Elves, residing in the village of Celebannon upon the Forest River.<ref>{{ICE
: [[David T. Wenzel]] portrayed the raft-elves as sturdy elves wearing garments in various tones of green.
